About Me:

I'm a software developer, student of computer science, climber of mountains and hills, lover of all music, reader of good books, organizer and attender of meetups, and runner.

If you want to reach me, have a question, or want to discuss anything related to coding, running, etc., feel free to drop me a line anytime at richard@richardalucas.com. Cheers!
